meanings.definition: A person or thing that swishes.
meanings.sent1: The swisher moved quickly through the room.
meanings.sent2: I saw a swisher cleaning the floors at the mall.
meanings.sent3: The little robot vacuum was a tiny swisher around the house.
meanings.sent4: The wind was a gentle swisher through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The broom was a reliable swisher in keeping the house tidy.

meanings.definition: A brand of cigar used for rolling marijuana.
meanings.sent1: He rolled a joint using a swisher cigar.
meanings.sent2: The group decided to use a swisher for their smoke session.
meanings.sent3: The swisher cigar was the star of the party.
meanings.sent4: The sweet aroma of the swisher filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The swisher cigar was passed around the circle of friends.
